title: AZALEA Unit Live: Day 1!
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>Is everyone ready?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Of course!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>All ready zura!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I believe that we, as AZALEA, will be able to give a stunning performance.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Chika and the others are also here cheering for us, so let’s do it like always!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru ate some Noppo bread, so Maru is fired up zura~~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu. It’s right before the show, but I see that no one is nervous.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>We’re more excited than nervous about it. I can see it on both of your faces.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru can’t wait to meet our fans zura! Let’s make today the most fun experience ever!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Absolutely!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yes, let us have our best stage yet!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
